mapper.select: SELECT tenant_contract_id, tenant_id, sales_contract_no, sales_personnel, contract_amount, contract_start_time, contract_end_time, product_package, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM tenant_contract WHERE tenant_contract_id = #{tenantContractId} and delete_flag = 0

select pp.product_package_name, tc.tenant_contract_id, tc.tenant_id, tc.sales_contract_no, tc.sales_personnel, tc.contract_amount, tc.contract_start_time, tc.contract_end_time, tc.product_package, tc.delete_flag, tc.create_by, tc.create_time, tc.update_by, tc.update_time from tenant_contract tc left join product_package pp on tc.product_package = pp.product_package_id and pp.delete_flag = 0 where tc.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and tc.delete_flag = 0 order by tc.update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tenant_contract (tenant_id, sales_contract_no, sales_personnel, contract_amount, contract_start_time, contract_end_time, product_package, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) VALUES (#{tenantContract.tenantId}, #{tenantContract.salesContractNo}, #{tenantContract.salesPersonnel}, #{tenantContract.contractAmount}, #{tenantContract.contractStartTime}, #{tenantContract.contractEndTime}, #{tenantContract.productPackage}, #{tenantContract.deleteFlag}, #{tenantContract.createBy}, #{tenantContract.createTime}, #{tenantContract.updateBy}, #{tenantContract.updateTime})
mapper.update:
UPDATE tenant_contract SET
tenant_id=#{tenantContract.tenantId},
sales_contract_no=#{tenantContract.salesContractNo},
sales_personnel=#{tenantContract.salesPersonnel},
contract_amount=#{tenantContract.contractAmount},
contract_start_time=#{tenantContract.contractStartTime},
contract_end_time=#{tenantContract.contractEndTime},
product_package=#{tenantContract.productPackage},
delete_flag=#{tenantContract.deleteFlag},
create_by=#{tenantContract.createBy},
create_time=#{tenantContract.createTime},
update_by=#{tenantContract.updateBy},
update_time=#{tenantContract.updateTime}
WHERE tenant_contract_id=#{tenantContract.tenantContractId}

UPDATE tenant_contract SET delete_flag= 1, update_by=#{updateBy}, update_time=#{updateTime} WHERE tenant_contract_id IN
#{item}
